name: Minecraft BO2 Object File
summary: Learn about .BO2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BO2 stands for Biome Object Builder version 2. The BO2 format was eventually replaced by the .BO3 format with the release of version 2.4 of Terrain Control.

description: Minecraft BO2 object file used by TerrainControl, a Minecraft modding application used to generate worlds; stores Minecraft terrain objects; also contains settings that control when sunlight, darkness, water, and lava are spawned in the world.
